title: What should I do when I miss anyone desperately? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is something which i had experienced but in my case it was one sided love, so i am not sure about your situation still i ll tell what i did in that situation.. i had literally forced myself to stop thinking about him, deleted his number so that i cannot call him up.. i used to miss him a lot but couldn't call and share all that because i mean nothing to him.. so i just let it go.. I had kept myself busy with my office work . Everyday used to console myself by thinking whatever happens , happens for a reason.. So stay positive and force yourself not to think about that person..

Well if they are your friends call them and open yourself before them if they worth it, if they care about you. Tell them even if they are not aware of your presence.And if you are getting over someone because things didn't work out between you two (or someone hurt you badly and left) then I guess you should ignore it, your feelings will fade with time and you will feel better sooner than you think. (Been there, done that, that's how I know)Concentrate on your work and let the time pass. There nothing more you can do about it except wait it to be over.
